message: Less than a day after meeting on Instagram in June 2016, Kettles told Whittemore, then 18, about his prostitution enterprise. Within a few days, Whittemore posted ads on Backpage.com, a website notorious for its use by prosititutes. A few days later, Kettles recruited a 13-year-old friend of Whittemore's, "enticing" her to join the operation.

data.description: A 26-year-old Nashville man was convicted Thursday of trafficking a 13-year-old for sex.
data.title: Nashville Man Convicted Of Trafficking 13-Year-Old For Sex
